title: help command and extension docs
body:
Idea came about in https://github.com/datalad/datalad-metalad/issues/86.

For documentation we basically have the `--help` option of commands only. For some aspects we need a way to have conceptual documentation, that isn't tied to a particular command. In the issue above it is about some general concepts of metalad, but it would be useful for other extensions and some things in core, too.

So: Have a `help` command, that uses some extension "entrypoint" to provide a general help page for extensions. It should be possible to also allow for generating arbitrary topic pages. Like `datalad help extension-name`, but also `datalad help ria-store`, `datalad help ria-url`, `datalad help archives-special-remote`, etc.

Ideally respective man pages would be rendered from that, too `man extension-name`, `man datalad-ria-store`, etc.


What do you think, @datalad/developers?
